CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 17, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Leech Farm Patients Stage 'Hobby Show' - Patients at Leech Farm Hospital staged their annual 'Hobby Show' of articles made by the patients while convalescing...In the next picture, at the top, left, standing beside Mrs. Fox are, left to right: Callie Jackson, Ralph Titus, Bobby Ficklin, Miss McClelland, the registered nurse; Leo Cox, Sally Graff and John Rogan. This group made leather belts, holsters for the young cowboy or girl, sun-glasses, jewel boxes and doilies... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Hospital patients and staff: Mrs. Fox, Callie Jackson, Ralph Titus, Bobby Ficklin, nurse McClelland, Leo Cox, Sally Graff and John Rogan posed behind table with crafts during "Hobby Show" at Leech Farm Hospital
